httpmix.command: node --max-old-space-size=65536 h1 POST url live.txt 120 999 8 randomstring=true & node --max-old-space-size=65536 h2 -m POST -u url -t 2 -d false -p live.txt --full true --delay 1

h1.command: node --max-old-space-size=65536 h1 POST url live.txt 120 999 8 randomstring=true

h2.command: node --max-old-space-size=65536 h2 -m POST -u url -s 120 -t 4 -r 8 -p live.txt -v 2 --full true --delay 1 -d false
